OOC: My newest attept at a character... Transmetal 2's are allowed right?

A Transformer pod careened through space, slamming into Earth�s atmosphere and into the smallest continent, about thirty miles from the Decpticon base. The pod�s life support system activated, and to deal with the energon, the pod scanned for DNA. Finding the nearest subject it quickly took into account the creatures� unique DNA and melded it to the protoform. 

The top opened from the pod and out stepped a huge Transmetal 2 spider. The fusion between metal and organic was disgusting, a gross mix of red and black. The bot quickly changed into robot mode to see what he was like. He jumped for joy. �Look at me! Look at me! Ah-hehehehehe!!!� He had huge eyes; a milky white color, his mouth looked organic, but the teeth inside were all metal, long needle teeth. His hands ended in huge claws, with a mixture of metal and organic. The eight spider legs attached to his arms, they had the added advantage of becoming guns in a fight.

�Ohh! This is too cool!� He said. His chest was mostly black, but he loved the way he looked. He let out a howl of laughter, �Ah-ha-ha-ha-he-he-hehehehehe!!!�
